pull_requests.title: BIP-172: add BIP-177 reference
pull_requests.body: BIP-0172 explicitly discusses and compares its approach with BIP-177 but the References section only listed the whitepaper and BIP-176. Added BIP-177 to the references to keep the document internally consistent and make it easier for readers to follow the related proposals.

comment_list.body: This is not a substantial improvement.
